articles.title: Traders now favour rand over pound amid UK fiscal crisis - News24
articles.description: South Africa’s rand, the currency considered a proxy for emerging-market risk, has been an underdog for years when it comes to trading against the British pound. But fiscal turmoil in the UK is turning that convention on its head.
